description:
Levi is your quintessential young straight guy. He loves sports and girls and has an all-around east coast thing going on. When we first met, he told me that he was open to fooling around with other guys, but had never done it.

He wanted to test the waters by being the top first. I wanted to pair him with someone who was a little more on the aggressive side because Levi is pretty laid back.

Claude was the first aggressive bottom that came to mind. Claude loves straight boys and I just knew they'd hit it off...
title: Levi & Claude
